title: Yankee Candle Sage & Citrus Wax Melts, 3 Packs of 6 (18 Total),Medium Green
description: Yankee Candle® Wax Melts create that just-right, relaxing feeling of home for you and those you love. These wax melts are designed for use in all electric and non-electric Yankee Candle® wax warmers. Each easy-to-open package holds 6 wax melts. Add an additional melt to the warmer to intensify the fragrance experience.
